privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Shokoladaran ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you visit or make a purchase from our website at shokoladaran.am (the "Site").

s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
s1.lead: We collect information from you in several ways to provide our services and improve your experience.

i1.t: If you choose to create an account, we collect your name, email address, and password.

i2.t: When you make a purchase, whether you are a registered user or a guest, we collect your name, billing and shipping addresses, email address, phone number, and payment information (such as credit card details, which are processed by our secure third-party payment processor and are not stored on our servers).

i3.t: If you contact us via email, customer support chat, or any other means, we collect the content of those communications.

i1.t: IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers.

i2.t: Pages you view, the time and date of your visit, and the referring website.

i3.t: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track your activity on our Site and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Site.

i1.t: We use your personal information to process your payments, arrange for shipping, and provide you with invoices and order confirmations.

i2.h: To Provide and Improve Our Services:
i2.t: This includes managing your account, providing customer support, and improving the functionality and user experience of our Site.

i3.t: We use your contact information to communicate with you about your orders, account, or to send you marketing and promotional materials (you can opt out of these at any time).

i4.t: We use this information to detect, prevent, and respond to potential fraud, unauthorized access, or other malicious activity.

i5.t: We use information to understand how users interact with our Site, which helps us improve our products and services.

s3.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
s3.lead: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third parties only in the following circumstances:

i1.t: We may share your information with third-party vendors and service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, shipping, data analysis, and email delivery. These providers are obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes for which it was disclosed.

i2.t: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, protect and defend the rights or property of Shokoladaran, or protect the personal safety of users of the Site or the public.

i3.t: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your personal information may be transferred to a new owner as part of the transaction.

i1.t: If you have a registered account, you can access and update your personal information by logging into your account.

i2.t: You can opt out of receiving marketing emails from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those emails.

i3.t: We do not respond to "Do Not Track" signals.

s5.title: 5. Data Security
s5.text: We take reasonable measures, including administrative, technical, and physical safeguards, to protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

s6.title: 6. Children's Privacy
s6.text: Our Site is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

s7.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
s7.text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date at the top. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

s8.title: 8. Contact Us
s8.lead: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
